links.title: KeyBanc Survey: Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) iPhone BOGO Promos Have Limited Inventory Effect
links.description: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ: AAPL) introduced a buy-one-get-one-free promotion earlier this year for its iPhone devices, including the high-end iPhone X. The promotions have had a "limited impact" on lowering iPhone inventories, according to KeyBanc Capital Markets. KeyBanc Capital Markets' John Vinh.

links.title: Nasdaq Hits Record As Dow Surges - INO.com Traders Blog
links.description: Hello traders everywhere. The Nasdaq is trading at record highs today erasing last weeks loss and triggering a new green monthly Trade Triangle. In fact, all three indexes are trading considerably higher today and trying to wipe out their losses from last week. The reason for the significant gains today, a huge jobs number.
